name: Amy Standridge
text: Stopped in needing a tire fixed. They were busy, but jumped right on fixing my tire, so I could get going. Fast, friendly, professional service. Will definitely be back in the future.  Thank you!

name: Dr. Tammy DeVenturi
text: I was very happy with the service received on the night my daughter had her car accident. At 3 o'clock in the morning they responded very quickly and everybody involved were very nice and made a horrible situation a lot easier. I would highly recommend this towing company. Thank you

name: Derek Randle
text: Stay away! The owner is a liar and a real p.o.s. I feel sorry for his employees.

name: Jay Tippett
text: I went there today which is Wednesday February 10th got there at 8:00 a.m. got my spark plugs changed and the spark plug wires plus the head gaskets which they changed within 30 minutes it was done another 30 45 minutes on the spark plugs in the wires and they charged me $300.... $200 worth of it for labor.. to me that's outrageous I feel like they just took total advantage of me if I'm wrong correct me but $200 for labor for three hours work ..come on

name: gary moorehead
text: There was a hiccup but they saw the issue very quickly and saved me a lot of money I recommend anyone to go to watha,s

name: Teela Holley
text: They worked well with me and had no problem with anything

name: Stacy Hester
text: Good place for oil change. They are fast

name: American Gamer Girl
text: The guy who put the car on the jack had dropped the car off the jack and broke a piece off the car. Tried to play it off as nothing, but it ended up being the covering of our brake lines. I don't care if it wasn't anything important, that was dangerous and reckless. If you break something, don't you dare not say anything.

name: Zipporah Hill
text: I have nothing to complain about I called because me and my family was on the side of the road and they came rightbon did not have to wait and hour at all. Very Great Service thank you guys some much.

name: Robert Leslie
text: We were 3 miles from the shop and needed a rear tire. I was told the tire would be about $200 but when they brought it it was $239 + tax plus $35 to put it on and by the time he added tax a tire I could have bought for $169 cost $300.  It hurt my pocket book! The man that changed it was great but I didn’t expect to pay $300

name: jeremy talley
text: Were happy to help with my issue, first time using them but I will go back if I need to

name: Melissa Burton
text: Friendly and will quickly get you taken care of. Even if you need to get something done on your lunch break.

name: Randy Rice
text: Great towing service helpful mechanic's know how to fix vehicles

name: Ryan May
text: Holy $&@#...bring your lube, folks! As someone who's mechanically savvy and used to work at an auto parts shop I can say these people will take you for all you're worth. I was passing through town and needed work done short notice. They did a good job, but paid absurd markup and really got bent over for labor that took less than 1 hour. Such a simple job, sure did pay for it though.

name: Donny Harden
text: shout out to the guys that wash and clean the cars $35 inside and out and they do a wonderful job.

name: Diana “Lolipop in December” Scott
text: Very nice people.went out of their way to help me.

name: William
text: Nice and decent service but holy hell the price for labor is through the roof. 150 bucks in labor just to replace spark plug wires. That is absurd. I mean honestly how long did it take you to diagnose that problem and then replace the wires? Seems like you're just taking advantage of people from out of town.

name: Patsy Lolley
text: Great!  Still have to get my oil changed!  Thsnk you Gary!

name: Janet May
text: My car broke on a Sunday and I was referred to Watha's.  I am grateful for their services.  Their prices were reasonable and they went out of their way to get me back to Arkansas that night.  Good people!

name: Shelia Williams
text: Wonderful bunch  to help u out...

name: Kristie Thornton
text: Always there for any needs you may have. Fast & Friendly service.

name: Skyler Cochran
text: Good prices great people

name: J Malone
text: They put gear dope in aluminum trans gaulded the bearings.

name: Anthony Williams
text: THEY WERE CALLED BY AAA AND IT TOOK OVER A HOUR AND A HALF TO COME GIVE US A JUMP

name: Boyd Anderson
text: On our way to Florida for family vacation, we broke down on the Highway 78 a few miles from Hamilton, AL around 5:00 pm on a Friday.  I looked up Watha's Towing on my phone and Mr. Watha himself showed up within minutes.  He towed us to a local garage and within 2 hours from our initial breakdown, we were back on the road!  I am so appreciative of this man and his towing service.  He is very kind and professional.  I hope you don't need a tow truck in Hamilton, AL but if you do, this is guy.

name: Candice Glenn
text: My mother was traveling on her way to Atlanta, she ran out of gas, and was stranded on the highway in the dark. She made 2 attempts to her roadside assistance, and was placed on hold for long periods of time. She sent me a text and asked that I find her some help. I found Watha's Towing using google. The man answered the phone on the 2nd ring, got some information from me. and Within 20 minutes he delivered fuel to my mother and she was on her way. The service was fast, friendly and reasonably priced. Thank you Watha's Towing for making an unpleasant experience as painless as possible.

name: Rita Haney
text: Great station in Hamilton Alabama good place to buy tires

name: Joe Estes
text: Great people

name: Rich L
text: Theifs...

name: Jimmie Sue Finch
text: Unorganized and nasty

name: Steve Busby
text: Great service!

name: Alexis Keller
text: Good

name: Whitney Shanklin
text: Agree

name: William Frederick
text: Good Man / Excellent Service  !

name: Daniel Argo
text: This place is known to be very expensive

name: Jackie Peoples
text: Good service

name: Barbara Ables
text: Quick stop

name: Suzie Mcgaughy
text: His receptionist had a bad attitude!!

name: Wendy McKay
text: very sweet people

name: William Estes
text: Fast dependable towing

name: daniel smith
text: Cashiers are rude service is slow

name: Roberta Hill
text: Polite, efficient service.

name: Michael Hager
text: Very friendly

name: John Wiggins
text: Extremely high prices

name: Valerie Dale
text: If you want to get some reasonably priced fuel as you're heading back from your fun trip to Atmore Alabama, be sure to stop at speedy Express pay AKA first choice groceries. I hear they got some great chicken there. Only reason leaving four stars is because it looks like it just needs to be updated a little.

name: tiffany lewis
text: Nice selection of ice cream but its a bit high

name: Suhag Patel
text: Great staff tasty food lower gas price

name: Leiira Hancock
text: We love the yellow store

name: Quanda00 Pettway
text: The owner is very inconsiderate my car got hit in the parking lot he has cameras but want try to help me I will never shop there again
